author: vmassol
msg: Adding new debug property (maven.abbot.debug) to debug webstart tests. It's unfinished as I'm unable for now to turn on webstart file logging (users have to open webstart and configure it to output logs to a file for now).

author: vmassol
msg: Added new maven.abbot.suite.name property to let the user name a test suite (which as a consequence generates a test report file with that name instead of the generic AbbotTestAll name)
